title: Add DEFI5 Index to Inverse DCA Vaults?
body:
We have the opportunity to establish a partnership with [Indexed.finance](https://indexed.finance/), beginning with this proposal to add their [DEFI5 index token](https://indexed.finance/index/defi5) to our DCA vaults.

Adding the DEFI5 index to our vaults offers Inverse the following benefits:

- Allows Inverse users to easily & gas-efficiently DCA into a basket of top-tier tokens with stables. No other project offers DCA into indices
- It will create synergy between our communities. Indexed is supported by Molly Wintermute and promoted by Redphone Crypto, so would add their weight to our supporter-base
- This opens the door to future collaboration with Indexed in both directions, and furthers our reputation as innovators in the new wave of Defi

This vote is meant to be a pre-vote.
It allows the concerned parties to make preparations for an implementation which will then be voted on onchain once it's ready.


Now it's up to you. Yes? or No?
The voting period is 48h (snapshot hours are confusing so forgive me if it's slightly more or less)
author: 0x7165ac4008c3603AfE432787419eB61B3a2CEe8B
